data.name: Weapons Knight - Official Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Journey of being the Weapons Knight


The Official Soundtrack for Weapons Knight captures the background of the game and the variety of places throughout, from caves to castles, the feeling of Weapons Knight is surrounded by vibrant tunes to fuel you on your journey.

The Weapons Knight Official Soundtrack is composed by Jayden Patrick (Jayden Cyprian)
